title: UASTrack: A Unified Adaptive Selection Framework with Modality-Customization in Single Object Tracking
author: He Wang (Jiangnan University), Tianyang Xu (Jiangnan University), Zhangyong Tang (Jiangnan University), Xiao-Jun Wu (Jiangnan University), Josef Kittler (University of Surrey)
relevance_why: The adaptive selection framework and modality-specific adaptations proposed in UASTrack could inspire the development of audio-visual models, particularly for tasks involving multi-modal tracking in audio generation or music information retrieval.
background: Single Object Tracking (SOT) seeks to reliably identify and locate a specific object in a video stream using multiple sensor modalities such as RGB images, thermal, or depth data.
contribution: UASTrack introduces a unified adaptive selection framework combining RGB with auxiliary modalities to enhance single-object tracking performance, achieving improved accuracy and efficiency.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods often required separate models or training parameters for different modalities, leading to inefficiencies.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work provides a single model architecture capable of dynamic modality adaptation with only a minimal increase in training parameters and computational cost.

key_innovation: Utilizes a Discriminative Auto-Selector to identify input modalities and enhances adaptability through task-specific optimization, enabling seamless integration of multi-modal data.
real_world_impact: This research has the potential to enhance tracking capabilities in various practical applications such as robotics, surveillance, and augmented reality by enhancing the robustness of multi-modal systems.
limitations: The paper does not mention specific limitations regarding the proposed framework.

new_terms.Discriminative Auto-Selector: **Discriminative Auto-Selector** is a component that dynamically identifies the type of input modality and optimizes the tracking approach accordingly.
new_terms.Task Customization Optimization Adapter: **Task Customization Optimization Adapter** refers to a mechanism that fine-tunes the tracking model based on the unique characteristics of different sensor modalities.
